summary.en: Bamboo-fiber pages with water-pattern cover and seasonal poems bring a tactile, collectible writing experience.

en: Water-textured cover with soft touch and scratch resistance.
100g bamboo-fiber pages handle fountain pens and brushes with minimal bleed.
Seasonal illustrations and poems accompany each month of writing.
Sewn binding lays flat for easy daily notes and sketches.
Includes custom bookmark and stickers for a portable ritual.
Great for work notes, travel sketches, or as a thoughtful gift.
Co-created with local workshops using eco-friendly, recyclable packing.
Optional name debossing and message card for a personal touch.

summary.en: Two balanced wolf-hair brushes, pine soot ink, xuan note pads, and portable felt help newcomers start gracefully.

en: Two wolf-hair brushes (soft & medium) cover regular script practice and flowing strokes.
Copy sheets and stroke breakdown guide help true beginners build rhythm.
Portable ink and mini inkstone let you practice anywhere.
30 sheets of thick xuan notepads resist bleed for practice or greetings.
Foldable felt and pouch keep the desk tidy and travel-ready.
Magnetic gift box fits New Year, graduation, or birthday gifting.
Co-developed with a historic Chengdu pen shop; consumables available later.
Scan to watch a 15-minute starter video prepared by our team.

title.en: 24 Solar Terms Â· Sticky & Mini Store

summary.en: Sticky notes, desk accessories, and scented wax chips styled with 24 solar term palettes and botanical textures.

en: Seasonal palettes for each of the 24 solar terms; 3 gradients per mini set.
Eco adhesive peels cleanly and re-sticks without residue.
Paired with scented wax chips to hang at desks or closets for gentle notes.
Desk kit includes receipt clip, wooden tray, and tiny glass bottle for petals or tickets.
Each term comes with a short note, inviting you to feel the season while working.
Inspired by plants around Chengdu, co-created with local illustrators.
Recyclable kraft packaging and plant-based inks for a tactile, green finish.
Perfect for workspaces, study nooks, or as seasonal gifts.

title.en: City Memory Â· Magnets & Travel Journal

summary.en: Hand-drawn city lines on magnets and travel journals help you capture every trip in sight and touch.

en: Line-art of Chengdu, Beijing, Shanghai, Chongqing landmarks with alley details.
Alloy + enamel magnets with strong hold keep tickets and photos in view.
Travel journal pages include planner, budget, stickers, and pockets for stubs.
City stamp stickers let you mark each destination in your journal.
Custom city option: share a trip photo; we sketch and make a limited sticker run.
Drawer-style box stores keepsakes and doubles as a desk organizer.
Three new city designs every quarter to keep collections fresh.
Great for couples, friends, or families to document warm journeys.
